title: General Support
description: This section is for general questions about the Empowerment Through Mindset Foundation (ETMF), our mission and more, or if you're not sure who else to contact

categories.text: Questions specifically about the ETMF Academy Program
If you are with an organization (educational institution, non-profit, business, etc.) and are interested in partnering or collaborating with ETMF, reach out to us. We would love to hear from you.
Contact us in this section to learn about current volunteer openings and how you can get involved.
For questions about making a donation to ETMF, or if your business is interested in sponsoring our programs or events, please use this section. Your support is greatly appreciated.
Members of the media seeking information about ETMF, interviews, or press materials should contact us here.
If you are experiencing technical issues with the website (broken links, pages not loading correctly, etc.) or have feedback about the website's functionality, please let us know in this section.
For questions or clarifications regarding our website's Terms and Conditions or Privacy Policy, please contact us here.
If you do not find your specific category of interest listed, please select this section to address your particular inquiries.

title: Executive Board Members
description: For formal inquiries, high-level partnership proposals, major donation discussions, or direct communication intended for the Empowerment Through Mindset Foundation's Executive Leadership board.

categories.textHeader: Treasurer & Chief Product and Technology Officer (CPTO)
